meanings.definition: A type of organic compound found in certain plants, used in the production of dyes and medicines.
meanings.sent1: The anthraquinones extracted from the plant were used to create vibrant dyes.
meanings.sent2: Many traditional medicines contain anthraquinones for their healing properties.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel accidentally spilled anthraquinones on its fur, turning it a bright shade of purple.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity flowed like a river of anthraquinones, coloring every aspect of her life.
meanings.sent5: The scent of anthraquinones filled the air, signaling the start of the dye-making process.
